1.21.1.1.21.1-0.4.0-Beta:
✨ Added schematic system (save/load, auto-load on world gen)
🛠 Default world type set by mod (no external mod needed)
🚫 Removed experimental warning
🧹 Internal improvements with TierManager & utilities
1.21.1.1.21.1-0.5.0-Beta:
✨ Instanced Tiers System for safer data loading (⚠️ backup your world!)
✨ JEI Integration for NeoBlock blocks
🛠 Improved trade parsing (back up config for regeneration)
🛠 Commands: 'force reset', enable/disable tiers, permission levels
🧹 Renamed 'trader-trades' → 'trades' in config (old configs still work)
🪓 Dropped support for Minecraft 1.20.1

✨ Added schematic system (save/load, auto-load on world gen)
🛠 Default world type set by mod (no external mod needed)
🚫 Removed experimental warning
🧹 Internal improvements with TierManager & utilities
